game.name: Geobeast
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, Steam 도전 과제, 통계, Steam 순위표
game.shortDescription: Test your geography skills with Geobeast! Find as many countries as you can in 12 minutes, master two unique game modes, and climb the global Steam leaderboard.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Test your geography skills with Geobeast! Find as many countries as you can in 12 minutes, master two unique game modes, and climb the global Steam leaderboard.
